title: Amplitude alternative suggestion
content:
I'm looking for something similar to Amplitude. By similar I mean something that is sans, is a little bit agressive, has display size qualities yet could still be used for short text sized advertising paragraphs.

If any of this makes sense.

It would be a primary face for a corporate identity. Our budget is just a bit less than would be needed to purchase the entire amplitude family. Im looking for something that can come in around $200 for the family, or at least under $300.

Any bright ideas?
author: Hildebrant

comments.content:
First, rather than assuming you will purchase the entire family, how many weights and widths do you truly need? Example: get 4 weights of Amplitude in 2 widths for $280.

[Amplitude 1 Normal](http://web.archive.org/web/20141011132338/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=FB.111841.0.0) - Light, Regular, Bold, Black - $140  
 [Amplitude 1 Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20141011132338/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=FB.111841.0.0) - Light, Regular, Bold, Black - $140

The same eight fonts would cost only $240 at [Font Bureau](http://web.archive.org/web/20141011132338/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Amplitude/styles), the publisher of Amplitude, due to Font Bureau's "bulk discount."

Ewwwww, no, lol. I actually found it on [deviantART](http://web.archive.org/web/20141011132338/http:/www.deviantart.com/) quite some time ago.

But now that Altria have appropriated my avatar, I _should_ probably look for something else... :)

Hey, if you think Sophisto is "agressive" enough, you'll get the whole pack for just $179  
 [http://www.psyops.com/html/spec\_sophisto\_ss.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20141011132338/http:/www.psyops.com/html/spec_sophisto_ss.html "http://www.psyops.com/html/spec\_sophisto\_ss.html")

;-)
Thanks, Gents. We have gone with Sophisto.

Thanks Kyle! Let me know how things develops on this project.

And as always, thanks for your support Stephen ;-)
